message.en: Despite the conditions,{p=0.2} though,{p=0.2} the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] lives.{p=0.5} It's our job to keep it that way.

message.en: [color=#ee8695]We[/color]{p=0.5} are a part of them:{p=0.5} the [color=#ee8695]host[/color].
